record.description: With almost Seventy-five families occupying the "Prefabs," on the 61st Street and Greenwood Avenue site, there are at least half a dozen or more lines full of clothes every day. Young homemakers with youngsters like Mrs. Donald Hawkins often wash twice a week. Soon there will be two good sizes laundries on the lot.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: PR stamp. Public Relations stamp. Caption attached.
